title: Secret Management: Passwords And Secrets In Infrastructure Code
description:
Query to find passwords and secrets in infrastructure code.
**Platform:** Common
**Category:** Secret Management
**Issue type:** RedundantAttribute
mitigation: Hardcoded secret key should not appear in source

title: Access Control: S3 Bucket Access to Any Principal
description:
S3 Buckets must not allow Actions From All Principals, as to prevent leaking private information to the entire internet or allow unauthorized data tampering / deletion. This means the 'Effect' must not be 'Allow' when there are All Principals
**Platform:** Terraform
**Category:** Access Control
**Issue type:** IncorrectValue
**Actual value:** aws_s3_bucket_policy[this].policy.Principal is equal to or contains '*'
mitigation: aws_s3_bucket_policy[this].policy.Principal is not equal to, nor does it contain '*'

title: Access Control: S3 Bucket Allows Get Action From All Principals
description:
S3 Buckets must not allow Get Action From All Principals, as to prevent leaking private information to the entire internet or allow unauthorized data tampering / deletion. This means the 'Effect' must not be 'Allow' when the 'Action' is Get, for all Principals.
**Platform:** Terraform
**Category:** Access Control
**Issue type:** IncorrectValue
**Actual value:** aws_s3_bucket_policy[this].policy.Action is a 'Get' action

title: Encryption: S3 Bucket Without Server-side-encryption
description:
S3 bucket should have encryption defined
**Platform:** Terraform
**Category:** Encryption
**Issue type:** MissingAttribute
**Actual value:** 'aws_s3_bucket.server_side_encryption_configuration' is missing

title: Insecure Configurations: S3 Static Website Host Enabled
description:
Checks if any static websties are hosted on buckets
**Platform:** Terraform
**Category:** Insecure Configurations
**Issue type:** IncorrectValue
**Actual value:** resource.aws_s3_bucket[this].website does have static websites inside
mitigation: resource.aws_s3_bucket[this].website doesn't have static websites inside

title: Resource Management: CPU Limits Not Set
description:
CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Resource Management
**Issue type:** MissingAttribute
**Actual value:** spec.template.spec.containers.name=example doesn't have CPU limits

title: Availability: Liveness Probe Is Not Defined
description:
Liveness Probe must be defined.
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Availability
**Issue type:** MissingAttribute
**Actual value:** metadata.name={{example}}.spec.containers.name={{example}}.livenessProbe is undefined

title: Observability: S3 Bucket Without Versioning
description:
S3 bucket without versioning
**Platform:** Terraform
**Category:** Observability
**Issue type:** MissingAttribute
**Actual value:** 'versioning' is missing

title: Insecure Configurations: Seccomp Profile Is Not Configured
description:
Check if any resource does not configure Seccomp default profile properly
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Insecure Configurations
**Issue type:** MissingAttribute
**Actual value:** 'spec.template.metadata.annotations' is undefined

title: Insecure Defaults: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
description:
Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Insecure Defaults
**Issue type:** MissingAttribute
**Actual value:** 'spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken' is undefined

title: Best Practices: No Drop Capabilities for Containers
description:
Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Best Practices
**Issue type:** MissingAttribute
**Actual value:** metadata.name={{example}}.spec.containers.name=example.securityContext is undefined

title: Access Control: Permissive Access to Create Pods
description:
The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Access Control
**Issue type:** IncorrectValue
**Actual value:** metadata.name=example.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=example.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
mitigation: metadata.name=example.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=example.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

title: Insecure Configurations: Pod or Container Without Security Context
description:
A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Insecure Configurations
**Issue type:** MissingAttribute
**Actual value:** spec.template.spec.containers.name=example does not have a security context

title: Access Control: RBAC Wildcard In Rule
description:
Kubernetes Roles and ClusterRoles should not use wildcards in rules (objects or actions)
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Access Control
**Issue type:** IncorrectValue
**Actual value:** metadata.name={{example}}.rules[0].apiGroups contains value: '*'

title: Access Control: RBAC Wildcard In Rule
description:
Kubernetes Roles and ClusterRoles should not use wildcards in rules (objects or actions)
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Access Control
**Issue type:** IncorrectValue
**Actual value:** metadata.name={{example}}.rules[0].resources contains value: '*'

title: Access Control: RBAC Wildcard In Rule
description:
Kubernetes Roles and ClusterRoles should not use wildcards in rules (objects or actions)
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Access Control
**Issue type:** IncorrectValue
**Actual value:** metadata.name={{example}}.rules[0].verbs contains value: '*'

title: Access Control: RBAC Wildcard In Rule
description:
Kubernetes Roles and ClusterRoles should not use wildcards in rules (objects or actions)
**Platform:** Kubernetes
**Category:** Access Control
**Issue type:** IncorrectValue
**Actual value:** metadata.name={{example}}.rules[1].verbs contains value: '*'

title: Observability: S3 Bucket Logging Disabled
description:
S3 bucket without logging
**Platform:** Terraform
**Category:** Observability
**Issue type:** MissingAttribute
**Actual value:** 'logging' is missing
